main event: A civilian observed a circular white light descending into the trees for about 3 seconds near Wappingers Falls, New York.
interesting points: The observer has reported seeing similar objects at intervals since March 31, 1966., The object was described as being the size of a pea held at arm's length., The object disappeared into the trees at a 45 degree angle towards the ground., The sighting occurred at night under dark conditions with no stars visible., The observer's reliability is considered fair.
